footer.tagline: The trusted knowledge hub that learns - secure, accurate, and scalable.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build a trusted knowledge hub for your organization
features.feature1Desc: Every answer includes full source citations, allowing you to verify information and trace back to original documents.
features.feature2Desc: SOC 2 compliant with end-to-end encryption, role-based access control, and comprehensive audit logs.
features.feature3Desc: Advanced AI models trained specifically for knowledge work, ensuring reliable and accurate responses.
features.feature4Desc: Built to handle enterprise-scale workloads with automatic scaling and high availability.
features.feature5Desc: Your data stays yours. We never use your content to train models, ensuring complete data sovereignty.
features.feature6Desc: Comprehensive analytics dashboard to track usage, performance, and knowledge gaps.

featuresGrid.title: Built for
featuresGrid.subtitle: Every feature designed with accuracy, security, and scalability as core principles
featuresGrid.ingestDesc: PDFs, spreadsheets, images, videos, and 50+ connectors. Our intelligent parsing understands structure and context.
featuresGrid.secureDesc: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption, granular access controls, and comprehensive audit logs.
featuresGrid.scalableDesc: Handle millions of documents with enterprise-grade infrastructure, global CDN, and 99.9% uptime SLA.
featuresGrid.accurateDesc: Every response is grounded in your data with AI validation and confidence scoring.

problemSolution.title: Built for
problemSolution.subtitle: Transform scattered documents into a trusted knowledge base
problemSolution.challenge1Desc: Engineering drawings, tables, and critical documents spread across systems
problemSolution.challenge2Desc: Hours manually extracting data from complex document formats
problemSolution.challenge3Desc: Unreliable AI outputs without source verification or employee validation
problemSolution.solution1Desc: Parse engineering drawings, tables, and complex documents into structured chunks
problemSolution.solution2Desc: Your team members validate outputs, creating synthetic data for continuous learning
problemSolution.solution3Desc: Get verifiable answers with complete document-to-chunk traceability

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Insights, updates, and best practices from the Knowledge Stack team
blog.noPosts: No posts found matching your criteria.

chunking-strategies-document-types.title: Chunking Strategies for Different Document Types
chunking-strategies-document-types.excerpt: Different document types require different chunking strategies. Learn how to optimize chunking for code, tables, lists, and other content types.

complex-tables.title: Complex Tables: Merged Cells, Nested Structures, and Headers
complex-tables.excerpt: Complex tables with merged cells and nested structures are common in enterprise documents. Learn how to parse these challenging structures while preserving meaning.

document-parsing-fundamentals.title: The Foundation: Understanding Document Parsing in RAG Systems
document-parsing-fundamentals.excerpt: Document parsing is the foundation of any RAG system. Learn why parsing matters, the challenges enterprises face, and how proper parsing ensures accurate knowledge retrieval.

email-threads-conversations.title: Email Threads and Conversations: Context Preservation
email-threads-conversations.excerpt: Email threads contain valuable knowledge but require careful parsing to preserve context. Learn how to handle email conversations, attachments, and threaded discussions in RAG systems.

fixed-size-chunking.title: Fixed-Size Chunking: Simple but Effective
fixed-size-chunking.excerpt: Fixed-size chunking is the simplest chunking strategy. Learn when it works well, its limitations, and how to optimize it for better RAG performance.

getting-started-with-knowledge-stack.title: Getting Started with Knowledge Stack: A Complete Guide
getting-started-with-knowledge-stack.excerpt: Learn how to set up and start using Knowledge Stack in your organization. This comprehensive guide covers everything from initial setup to advanced features.

handling-scanned-pdfs.title: Handling Scanned PDFs: Quality, Accuracy, and Preprocessing
handling-scanned-pdfs.excerpt: Scanned PDFs present unique challenges for RAG systems. Learn how to assess quality, apply preprocessing techniques, and achieve high OCR accuracy for scanned documents.

handling-spreadsheets.title: Handling Spreadsheets: Excel, CSV, and Data Files
handling-spreadsheets.excerpt: Spreadsheets contain vast amounts of structured data. Learn how to parse Excel files, CSV data, and spreadsheet formats while preserving structure and relationships.

image-based-documents.title: Image-Based Documents: Charts, Diagrams, and Visual Content
image-based-documents.excerpt: Not all information in documents is text. Charts, diagrams, and visual content contain valuable knowledge. Learn how to extract and utilize this visual information in RAG systems.

introduction-to-rag.title: Introduction to RAG: Why It Matters for Enterprise Knowledge
introduction-to-rag.excerpt: Discover why Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) is revolutionizing how enterprises manage and access their knowledge. Learn the fundamentals and see how Knowledge Stack makes RAG accessible for every organization.

knowledge-stack-intelligent-chunking.title: Knowledge Stack's Intelligent Chunking: Adaptive Strategies
knowledge-stack-intelligent-chunking.excerpt: Learn how Knowledge Stack combines multiple chunking strategies into an intelligent, adaptive system that optimizes for each document and use case.

multi-format-documents.title: The Challenge of Multi-Format Documents in Enterprise
multi-format-documents.excerpt: Enterprises deal with documents in dozens of formats from various sources. Learn how to handle this complexity and ensure consistent parsing across all document types.

multi-language-ocr.title: Multi-language OCR: Supporting Global Enterprises
multi-language-ocr.excerpt: Global enterprises deal with documents in multiple languages. Learn how multi-language OCR enables RAG systems to extract knowledge from documents in any language.

ocr-in-rag.title: OCR in RAG: Extracting Text from Scanned Documents
ocr-in-rag.excerpt: Many enterprise documents are scanned images or PDFs. Learn how OCR (Optical Character Recognition) enables RAG systems to extract knowledge from these documents and the challenges involved.

parsing-challenges-edge-cases.title: Parsing Challenges: Edge Cases and How Knowledge Stack Solves Them
parsing-challenges-edge-cases.excerpt: Real-world documents present edge cases that challenge parsing systems. Learn about common edge cases and how Knowledge Stack handles them to ensure reliable parsing.

parsing-code-documentation.title: Parsing Code and Technical Documentation
parsing-code-documentation.excerpt: Technical documentation and code require specialized parsing. Learn how to handle code blocks, API documentation, and technical content in RAG systems.

parsing-structured-tables.title: Parsing Structured Tables: Preserving Relationships
parsing-structured-tables.excerpt: Learn how to parse structured tables while preserving row and column relationships. Discover techniques for maintaining table structure in RAG systems.

recursive-chunking.title: Recursive Chunking: Handling Nested Structures
recursive-chunking.excerpt: Recursive chunking handles documents with nested structures by chunking hierarchically. Learn how it works for complex documents with multiple levels of organization.

semantic-chunking.title: Semantic Chunking: Preserving Meaning Across Boundaries
semantic-chunking.excerpt: Semantic chunking splits documents at semantic boundaries, preserving meaning and context. Learn how it works and when it outperforms fixed-size chunking.

table-extraction-best-practices.title: Table Extraction Best Practices: What Knowledge Stack Does
table-extraction-best-practices.excerpt: Learn the best practices for table extraction in RAG systems and how Knowledge Stack implements them to ensure accurate, reliable table parsing for enterprise use cases.

text-extraction-formats.title: Text Extraction: Handling PDFs, Word Docs, and Markdown
text-extraction-formats.excerpt: Learn the intricacies of extracting text from different document formats. Discover the challenges and best practices for PDFs, Word documents, and Markdown files in RAG systems.

why-chunking-matters.title: Why Chunking Matters: Breaking Down Documents for RAG
why-chunking-matters.excerpt: Chunking is crucial for RAG systems. Learn why breaking documents into optimal chunks affects retrieval accuracy, answer quality, and system performance.

why-tables-matter.title: Why Tables Are Critical in Enterprise RAG Systems
why-tables-matter.excerpt: Tables contain some of the most valuable information in enterprise documents. Learn why table parsing is crucial for RAG systems and what happens when tables are parsed incorrectly.

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join us in building the future of enterprise knowledge management
careers.intro: We're looking for talented individuals who are passionate about AI, security, and building products that make a real difference. If you're excited about solving complex problems and working with cutting-edge technology, we'd love to hear from you.
careers.position1Description: Design and develop scalable, high-quality backend solutions that power our enterprise knowledge management platform. You'll build robust APIs and services, optimize performance, and ensure system reliability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate backend services seamlessly and maintain rigorous data security measures. Experience with cloud services, containerization, and modern backend technologies is essential.
careers.position2Description: Develop and deploy machine learning models to enhance our AI-powered knowledge management capabilities. You'll work on cutting-edge AI solutions, analyze large datasets, and integrate AI/ML capabilities into our products. Collaborate with engineering teams to optimize and maintain ML models in production. Strong background in Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and experience with NLP and knowledge extraction is preferred.
careers.position3Description: Lead the development of user-facing features and create seamless, engaging user experiences. You'll work with modern frontend frameworks to build responsive, high-performance interfaces. Collaborate closely with designers and backend engineers to translate design concepts into functional applications. Expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern frontend tooling is required.
careers.position4Description: Drive growth by building relationships with enterprise clients and closing strategic deals. You'll identify opportunities, develop account strategies, and work closely with technical teams to deliver solutions that meet client needs. Strong communication skills, enterprise sales experience, and a deep understanding of enterprise knowledge management solutions are essential.
careers.benefit2: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
careers.benefit3: Flexible PTO and remote work options
careers.benefit5: Top-tier equipment and home office setup
careers.noRole: Don't see a role that fits? We're always looking for great talent.

security.title: Security Overview
security.subtitle: Enterprise-grade security built into every layer of our platform
security.feature1Desc: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption.
security.feature2Desc: We maintain SOC 2 Type II certification, ensuring the highest standards of security and compliance.
security.feature3Desc: Role-based access control (RBAC) ensures users only access data they're authorized to view.
security.feature4Desc: Comprehensive audit logs track all access and modifications for complete traceability.
security.feature5Desc: Advanced threat detection and monitoring systems protect against security incidents.
security.feature6Desc: We conduct regular third-party security audits and penetration testing.

integrations.subtitle: Connect Knowledge Stack with your existing tools and workflows
integrations.integration1Desc: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and more. Sync your data automatically.
integrations.integration2Desc: Integrate with Google Drive, Dropbox, SharePoint, and other document management systems.
integrations.integration3Desc: Native integrations with AWS, Azure, and GCP for seamless cloud deployments.
integrations.integration4Desc: RESTful API and webhook support for custom integrations and automation.
integrations.integration5Desc: Slack, Microsoft Teams, and email integrations for seamless collaboration.
integrations.integration6Desc: Connect with Salesforce, HubSpot, Notion, and other productivity tools.
integrations.customIntegration: Need a custom integration? We're here to help.

docsOverview.title: Welcome to Knowledge Stack Documentation
docsOverview.subtitle: This site will help you start building enterprise RAG systems—upload documents, create knowledge bases, and query your data with AI-powered search and retrieval.
docsOverview.quickStart1Desc: Make your first API call in minutes. Step-by-step instructions with sample requests and responses.
docsOverview.quickStart2Desc: Try Knowledge Stack in your browser. Upload documents, query knowledge bases, and see results instantly.
docsOverview.coreAPIsDesc: Knowledge Stack's endpoints are the building blocks of enterprise RAG systems. Use them individually or combine them into powerful pipelines.
docsOverview.uploadDesc: Upload documents to your knowledge base. Supports PDFs, Word docs, spreadsheets, and more.
docsOverview.parseDesc: Convert documents into structured text, tables, and figures—the foundation for RAG.
docsOverview.chunkDesc: Intelligently break large documents into semantic chunks while preserving context.
docsOverview.queryDesc: Search and retrieve information from your knowledge base with source citations.
docsOverview.whatYouCanBuildDesc: Teams use Knowledge Stack to build enterprise RAG systems across industries:
docsOverview.useCase1Desc: Bank statements, company reports, transaction logs
docsOverview.useCase3Desc: Patient records, lab reports, HIPAA release forms
docsOverview.useCase6Desc: Course materials, research papers, academic documentation
docsOverview.caseStudies: For real-world case studies, visit our
docsOverview.resource1Desc: Full details on every endpoint, parameters, and response format. Generated from OpenAPI specifications.

docsOverview.resource4Desc: Get help from our team or join the community.

about.title: About Knowledge Stack
about.subtitle: Building the future of enterprise knowledge management
about.missionDescription: To empower organizations with trusted, accurate knowledge that drives better decisions and outcomes.
about.securityDescription: We believe security and privacy are fundamental rights, not optional features.
about.innovationDescription: Continuously pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI and knowledge management.
about.customerDescription: Your success is our success. We build products that solve real problems.
about.paragraph1: Knowledge Stack was founded with a simple mission: to make enterprise knowledge accessible, accurate, and trustworthy. In an era where information overload is the norm, we provide organizations with the tools they need to harness their collective knowledge effectively.
about.paragraph2: Our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with enterprise-grade security and compliance standards. We understand that when organizations rely on AI for critical decisions, accuracy and traceability aren't optional—they're essential.
about.paragraph3: Today, Knowledge Stack powers knowledge management for organizations across industries, from healthcare to finance, helping teams make better decisions faster while maintaining the highest standards of security and compliance.

industryShowcase.title: Transforming Industries with
industryShowcase.subtitle: See how Knowledge Stack delivers mission-critical accuracy across different industries, handling their most complex documents with precision.
industryShowcase.financeDesc: Extract key insights from investor decks, huge spreadsheets, dense pitch materials, and SEC filings. Reduce handles complex tables, charts, and financial statements with precision.
industryShowcase.financeTestimonial: Knowledge Stack helped us parse tabular documents accurately. We needed hours validating the generated reports. Now we can easily validate the results with a click.
industryShowcase.financeAuthor: Senior Fund Manager, Major US Bank
industryShowcase.healthcareDesc: Process medical records, clinical trials, research papers, and regulatory documents. Extract structured data from complex medical charts and diagnostic reports.
industryShowcase.healthcareTestimonial: Knowledge Stack transformed how we process clinical data. What used to take weeks of manual review now happens in hours with higher accuracy.
industryShowcase.insuranceDesc: Analyze policy documents, claims data, risk assessments, and actuarial reports. Process complex insurance forms and regulatory filings with complete accuracy.
industryShowcase.insuranceTestimonial: The accuracy in processing our complex policy documents exceeded our expectations. Knowledge Stack handles edge cases our previous solutions missed.
industryShowcase.insuranceAuthor: VP of Technology, Major Insurance Carrier
industryShowcase.legalDesc: Process contracts, legal briefs, court filings, and regulatory documents. Extract key clauses, dates, and obligations from complex legal documents.
industryShowcase.legalTestimonial: Knowledge Stack revolutionized our document review process. We can now handle complex M&A due diligence in days instead of weeks.

technicalPipeline.title: From
technicalPipeline.parsingDesc: Normalizes inputs across formats like PDFs, DOCs, HTML, and media
technicalPipeline.extractionDesc: Identifies key signals like entities, metadata, and boundaries
technicalPipeline.chunkingDesc: Segments content into logically grouped chunks using type-specific strategies
technicalPipeline.indexingDesc: Builds vector, keyword, and summary indexes for semantic search and keyword retrieval
technicalPipeline.retrievalDesc: Handles multi-index retrieval for context-rich results for any LLM.

testimonials.testimonial1Quote: Knowledge Stack's document processing capabilities have transformed how we handle complex telecommunications data. The accuracy and speed are remarkable.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: Knowledge Stack's table parsing is incredibly accurate. Complex financial tables that used to take our team hours to process are now extracted and verified in seconds.
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: Knowledge Stack took over our entire RAG pipeline, letting us focus purely on agent logic. The document processing and retrieval quality is enterprise-grade.

deployment.title: Security You
deployment.subtitle: Choose how and where you deploy Knowledge Stack. Your data, your infrastructure, your rules.
deployment.feature1Desc: Built with security-first architecture and enterprise-grade data protection
deployment.feature2Desc: Your data never leaves your environment or gets used for training AI models
deployment.feature3Desc: Deploy Knowledge Stack entirely within your infrastructure for maximum control
deployment.deploymentText: From cloud-native SaaS to fully air-gapped on-premise installations, Knowledge Stack adapts to your security and compliance requirements.

expertValidation.title: Crowdsourced
expertValidation.subtitle: Auto-learning Loop for Continuous Improvement
expertValidation.hierarchyDesc: Visual map showing how this citation was constructed from source materials.
expertValidation.howItWorksText: When your team members validate AI outputs during daily workflows, they add to your enterprise knowledge. The validated content can then be used for future AI generations, thereby creating a growing web of trusted knowledge over time.
expertValidation.sourceCitationsDesc: Every response, including generated content, is traceable back to source.
expertValidation.employeeValidationDesc: Your team members review and correct AI outputs, ensuring accuracy and building trust in the system.
expertValidation.growingKnowledgeDesc: Each validation creates new synthetic data, expanding the knowledge base and improving future accuracy.
expertValidation.syntheticDataDesc: Corrections and generated insights become new content

interactiveDemo.title: Complete Source
interactiveDemo.subtitle: Click on any citation to explore its source. Every insight is grounded in your original documents with complete traceability.
interactiveDemo.ragPreviewDesc: Explore source citations and content generation.
interactiveDemo.chatMessage1: What are the key ethical considerations when developing AI systems?
interactiveDemo.chatMessage2: First, ensuring fairness and preventing bias is paramount [cite:1]. AI systems can inadvertently perpetuate or amplify existing societal biases [cite:2], so developers must implement robust testing and validation processes. Second, transparency and explainability are essential for building trust and enabling accountability [cite:1]. Users should understand how AI systems make decisions that affect them. Finally, establishing proper governance frameworks with multi-stakeholder involvement helps ensure responsible development and deployment [cite:3].
interactiveDemo.chatMessage3: Can you elaborate on the transparency aspect?
interactiveDemo.chatMessage4: Transparency in AI systems involves multiple layers of openness and explainability [cite:1]. At the technical level, this means making algorithms interpretable and providing clear explanations for decisions. At the organizational level, it involves being open about data sources, model limitations, and potential risks. This transparency is crucial for enabling meaningful human oversight and maintaining public trust in AI systems.
interactiveDemo.citation1Text: Artificial intelligence systems must be designed with ethical considerations at their core. This includes ensuring fairness, transparency, and accountability in AI decision-making processes.
interactiveDemo.citation2Text: Bias in AI systems often stems from training data that reflects historical inequalities. Comprehensive bias testing across demographic groups is essential for fair AI deployment.
interactiveDemo.citation3Text: Effective AI governance requires clear policies, stakeholder involvement, and regular audits. Multi-stakeholder frameworks ensure diverse perspectives in AI development.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: Knowledge Stack ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.
privacy.section2Text: We collect information that you provide directly to us:
privacy.section2Item2: Content you upload or create within the service
privacy.section3Text: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.section3Item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.section3Item2: Process transactions and send related information
privacy.section3Item3: Send technical notices and support messages
privacy.section3Item4: Respond to your comments and questions
privacy.section4Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, access controls, and regular security audits.
privacy.section5Item1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
privacy.section5Item3: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.section5Item4: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy.section6Text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By accessing or using Knowledge Stack, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this service.
terms.section2Text: Permission is granted to temporarily use Knowledge Stack for personal or commercial purposes. This license does not include:
terms.section2Item2: Using the materials for any commercial purpose without written consent
terms.section2Item3: Attempting to reverse engineer any software
terms.section2Item4: Removing any copyright or proprietary notations
terms.section3Text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section4Text: You may not use our service:
terms.section4Item1: In any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
terms.section4Item2: To transmit any malicious code or harmful content
terms.section4Item3: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate another user
terms.section4Item4: To interfere with or disrupt the service
terms.section5Text: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Knowledge Stack and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.section6Text: In no event shall Knowledge Stack be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the service, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
terms.section7Text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.commitmentText: Knowledge Stack is fully compliant with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We are committed to protecting the privacy and rights of all individuals, particularly those in the European Union.
gdpr.rightsText: As a data subject, you have the following rights:
gdpr.right1: Right to access your personal data
gdpr.right2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
gdpr.right3: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
gdpr.processingText: We process personal data only for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes. We ensure that data processing is lawful, fair, and transparent. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure data security.
gdpr.exercisingText: To exercise any of your GDPR rights, please contact us at
gdpr.responseTime: We will respond to your request within 30 days.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.section1Text: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
cookiePolicy.section2Text: We use cookies for the following purposes:
cookiePolicy.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for the website to function properly
cookiePolicy.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
cookiePolicy.section3Text: We may use third-party services that set cookies on your device. These services help us analyze website usage and improve our services. We do not have control over these third-party cookies.
cookiePolicy.section4Text: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please keep in mind that removing or blocking cookies can impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.
cookiePolicy.section5Text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at
